text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Why should we listen to one of the main reasons COVID-19 spread? She walked in Chinatown of SF, and now she is supporting the group who were negligent. There is a good reason we don't need retarded thinking like this in government. https://t.co/oUy5bHexZO
